item.title: Nsa Shadowbrokers leak: analyzing EPICHERO
item.description: On April 8th, 2017, a moderately well-known group known as ShadownBrokers released a password to decipher the file known as EQGRP-Auction-Files posted in medium.com. A few hours later the Infosec community on social media (Twitter, Reddit, etc) was busy analyzing the leak. This article is about the reverse engineering of the exploit found in the leak and to be a bit more specific about the exploit known as EPICHERO.
